name: Hadi Hosseini
content: Hadi Hosseini's Homepage Hadi Hosseini Penn State University Home Bio Publications Teaching Service People FAIR Lab Contact Me hadi@psu.edu Hadi Hosseini I am an Associate Professor in the College of Information Sciences and Technology at Penn State University and an Associate Director of the Center for Artificial Intelligence Foundations and Engineered Systems (CAFE). I am a member of the Data Science and AI group; I am also affiliated with CS Theory Group and the Institute for Computational and Data Sciences. I was a postdoctoral research fellow at Carnegie Mellon University, hosted by Ariel Procaccia. I completed my Ph.D. in Computer Science at the University of Waterloo, advised by Kate Larson and Robin Cohen. I work on a vibrant set of problems related to AI, multiagent systems, algorithms, and economics that particular focus on societal impacts and fairness. I am especially passionate about projects that combine compelling theoretical insights with practical applications to help humans/AI make informed decisions. My research is supported by an NSF CAREER Award, an NSF Medium RI Award and an NSF CRII Award. Thank you, NSF! Professional Service International Foundation for Autonomous Agents and Multiagent Systems, Board of Directors Journal of Artificial Intelligence Research (JAIR), Associate Editor AAAI-26, Publicity Chair AAMAS-26, Scholarship Chair AAAI-25, Publicity Chair IJCAI-24, Workshop Chair AAMAS-24, Finance Chair AAAI-23, Job Fair Chair IJCAI-23, Workshop Chair If you are interested in joining my group, check out this page. Publicly Available Platforms MatchU.ai: Make Informed Decisions, Backed by Algorithms! Not-for-profit platform that blends education and research by offering an interactive tools to find how to form mutually beneficial relationships, decide how to distribute resources, or resolve conflicts about a set of alternatives through a suite of algorithms rooted in economics, computer science, and artificial intelligence. MatchXplain: Disover Your Preference Data (alpha version) Not-for-profit platform with the grand vision of providing explainable AI solutions that involve decisions under (often ill-structured) preference data. Its goal is delivering a suite of provable recommendations to facilitate decision-making through explainable data, robust matchings, and versatile solutions. In Media The Future of AI.
